<font size = "6" color = ""#1975d1""> SOUTH BEND DASHBOARD </font>

<font size="5" color="red"> The goal of this project is to  create a dashboard to show the location and related data to the parks, schools, businesses and abandoned properties in South Bend. </font> 
<br>
<font size="5" color="red"> The user will be able to filter the data by zip code and other filters on each tab. </font>  
<br>
<font size="5" color="red"> The team hopes the dashboard can help users gain more information about the city and make informative decisions regarding residence and business. </font>
